title: The Best and Zeitest 8/31: Harry Belafonte, Bill Maher, Marriage, Lion, VERZUZ
itunes:title: The Best and Zeitest 8/31: Harry Belafonte, Bill Maher, Marriage, Lion, VERZUZ
description:
On this edition of the Best and Zeitest Jack and Laci Mosley discuss a deep fake video of Harry Belafonte with Joe Biden's face on him to make him look sleepy, Bill Maher has bad takes, Katy Perry talked about her marriage to Russell Brand and Brad Pitt is dating a woman in an open marriage, there's a video of a huge Lion walking through a traffic jam, and the next VERZUZ matchup is Brandie vs Monica.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
